ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:0.5_0: The training rule on getting wool washed
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying among the Sakyans at Kapilavatthu in Banyan Tree Monastery.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.2_0: At that time the monks from the group of six got nuns to wash, dye, and comb wool.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.3_0: Because of this work, the nuns neglected recitation, questioning, the higher morality, the higher mind, and the higher wisdom.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.4_0: Mahāpajāpati Gotamī then approached the Buddha and said:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.5_0: And the Buddha said to her, “Gotamī, I hope the nuns are heedful, energetic, and diligent?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.6_0: “How could the nuns be heedful, Venerable Sir?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.7_0: And she told him what was happening.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.8_0: Because of this work, the nuns neglected recitation, questioning, the higher morality, the higher mind, and the higher wisdom.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.9_0: The Buddha then instructed, inspired, and gladdened her with a teaching.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.10_0: She bowed down, circumambulated him with her right side toward him, and left.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.11_0: The Buddha convened the Sangha of monks and questioned those monks:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.12_0: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.16_0: “These foolish men don’t know what’s appropriate and what’s inappropriate in dealing with each other, what’s inappropriate in dealing with each other, what’s inspiring behavior and what’s not.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.17_0: And still you got unrelated nuns to wash, dye, and comb wool.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.18_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.19_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.20.1_0: ‘If a monk gets an unrelated nun to wash, dye, or comb wool, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.2_0: and you have the same kind of perception ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.4_0: ... The monks who have been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.6_0: ’s mother’s side, of pure descent, irrefutable and impeccable in questions of ancestry back to the seventh paternal generation.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.9_0: If he tells him, “Wash it,” he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.10_0: When it has been washed, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.11_0: If he tells the dyer, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.12_0: When it has been dyed, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.13_0: If he tells her to comb it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.14_0: When it has been combed, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.15_0: The bowl should be relinquished to a sangha, a group, or an individual.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.16_0: And it should be done like this.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.18_0: ‘Venerables, this wool which I got washed by an unrelated nun is to be relinquished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.19_0: I don’t relinquish them to the Sangha.’ ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.22_0: ‘I give these tonics back to you.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.23.1_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to wash wool, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.24_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to wash and dye wool, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and one offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.25_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to wash and comb wool, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and one offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.26_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to wash, dye, and comb wool, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and two offenses of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.27_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to dye wool, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.28_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to dye and comb wool, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and one offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.29_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to dye and wash wool, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and one offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.30_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to dye, comb, and wash wool, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and two offenses of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.31_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to comb wool, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.32_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to comb and wash wool, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and one offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.33_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to comb and dye wool, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and one offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.34_0: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to comb, wash, and dye wool, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and two offenses of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.35_0: If she is unrelated, but he is unsure of it, ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.36_0: If she is unrelated, but he perceives her as related ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.37_0: If he gets her to wash wool belonging to someone else, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.38_0: If he gets a nun who is fully ordained only on one side to do the washing, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.39_0: If she is related, but he perceives her as such, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.40_0: If she is related, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.41_0: If she is related, and he perceives her as such, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.43_0: if she cooks it with her companion messenger, saying,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.45_0: if he gets a nun to wash an unused and finished article;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.46_0: if it is a trainee nun;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.50_0: The seventh rule, the training rule on getting wool washed, is finished.
